create or replace PACKAGE pdm_eme_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table pdm_event_messages
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:40:58)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'PDM_EME_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'PDM_EVENT_MESSAGES';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION eme_select_row( i_eme_ID   IN  pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_eme   OUT pdm_event_messages%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION eme_select_row_upd( i_eme_ID   IN  pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_eme   OUT pdm_event_messages%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE eme_lock_row( i_eme_ID   IN  pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE eme_lock_row_nowait( i_eme_ID   IN  pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE eme_insert_row ( io_rt_eme  IN OUT pdm_event_messages%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION eme_update_row( i_eme_ID   IN     pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_eme  IN OUT pdm_event_messages%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION eme_delete_row( i_eme_ID   IN  pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION eme_seq1_nextval
RETURN pdm_event_messages.ID%TYPE
;


END pdm_eme_tapi_pck;
/




package body pdm_eme_tapi_pck
is




function eme_select_row( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type
                       , o_rt_eme   out pdm_event_messages%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_eme ( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_event_messages eme
            where eme.id = i_eme_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_eme( i_eme_id => i_eme_id );
         fetch c_eme into o_rt_eme;
         l_found := c_eme%found;
         close c_eme;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_eme%isopen
         then
            close c_eme;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end eme_select_row;

function eme_select_row_upd( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type
                           , o_rt_eme   out pdm_event_messages%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_eme ( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_event_messages eme
            where eme.id = i_eme_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_eme( i_eme_id => i_eme_id );
   fetch c_eme into o_rt_eme;
   l_found := c_eme%found;
   close c_eme;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_eme%isopen
      then
         close c_eme;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end eme_select_row_upd;

procedure eme_lock_row( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_eme ( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_event_messages eme
              where eme.id = i_eme_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_eme_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                eme_lock_row_nowait( i_eme_id => i_eme_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_eme( i_eme_id => i_eme_id );
                  close c_eme;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_eme%isopen
         then
            close c_eme;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end eme_lock_row;

procedure eme_lock_row_nowait( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_eme ( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_event_messages eme
               where eme.id = i_eme_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_eme_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_eme( i_eme_id => i_eme_id );

            close c_eme;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_eme%isopen
        then
           close c_eme;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_eme_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end eme_lock_row_nowait;

function eme_perform_update( i_eme_id   in     pdm_event_messages.id%type
                           , io_rt_eme  in out pdm_event_messages%rowtype )
return number
;

function eme_perform_delete( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure eme_insert_row ( io_rt_eme  in out pdm_event_messages%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into pdm_event_messages( id
                                , ims_id
                                , imd_id
                                , evt_id
                                , pet_id
                                , event_time
                                , date_created )
              values ( io_rt_eme.id
                     , io_rt_eme.ims_id
                     , io_rt_eme.imd_id
                     , io_rt_eme.evt_id
                     , io_rt_eme.pet_id
                     , io_rt_eme.event_time
                     , io_rt_eme.date_created )
           returning id
                   , ims_id
                   , imd_id
                   , evt_id
                   , pet_id
                   , event_time
                   , date_created
                into io_rt_eme.id
                   , io_rt_eme.ims_id
                   , io_rt_eme.imd_id
                   , io_rt_eme.evt_id
                   , io_rt_eme.pet_id
                   , io_rt_eme.event_time
                   , io_rt_eme.date_created;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_eme.id||'"'
                                                             ||', IMS_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.ims_id||'"'
                                                             ||', IMD_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.imd_id||'"'
                                                             ||', EVT_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.evt_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PET_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.pet_id||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_eme.event_time||'"'
                                                             ||', DATE_CREATED = "'||io_rt_eme.date_created||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end eme_insert_row;

function eme_perform_update( i_eme_id   in     pdm_event_messages.id%type
                           , io_rt_eme  in out pdm_event_messages%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update pdm_event_messages
            set id = io_rt_eme.id
              , ims_id = io_rt_eme.ims_id
              , imd_id = io_rt_eme.imd_id
              , evt_id = io_rt_eme.evt_id
              , pet_id = io_rt_eme.pet_id
              , event_time = io_rt_eme.event_time
              , date_created = io_rt_eme.date_created
          where id = i_eme_id
      returning id
              , ims_id
              , imd_id
              , evt_id
              , pet_id
              , event_time
              , date_created
           into io_rt_eme.id
              , io_rt_eme.ims_id
              , io_rt_eme.imd_id
              , io_rt_eme.evt_id
              , io_rt_eme.pet_id
              , io_rt_eme.event_time
              , io_rt_eme.date_created;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_eme.id||'"'
                                                             ||', IMS_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.ims_id||'"'
                                                             ||', IMD_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.imd_id||'"'
                                                             ||', EVT_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.evt_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PET_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.pet_id||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_eme.event_time||'"'
                                                             ||', DATE_CREATED = "'||io_rt_eme.date_created||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end eme_perform_update;

function eme_perform_delete( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from pdm_event_messages
          where id = i_eme_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_eme_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end eme_perform_delete;

function eme_update_row( i_eme_id   in     pdm_event_messages.id%type
                       , io_rt_eme  in out pdm_event_messages%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         eme_lock_row( i_eme_id   =>  i_eme_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            eme_perform_update( i_eme_id   =>  i_eme_id
                              , io_rt_eme  => io_rt_eme );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_eme.id||'"'
                                                          ||', IMS_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.ims_id||'"'
                                                          ||', IMD_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.imd_id||'"'
                                                          ||', EVT_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.evt_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PET_ID = "'||io_rt_eme.pet_id||'"'
                                                          ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_eme.event_time||'"'
                                                          ||', DATE_CREATED = "'||io_rt_eme.date_created||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end eme_update_row;

function eme_delete_row( i_eme_id   in  pdm_event_messages.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         eme_lock_row( i_eme_id   =>  i_eme_id );

         
         l_deleted := eme_perform_delete( i_eme_id   =>  i_eme_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_eme_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end eme_delete_row;

function eme_seq1_nextval
return pdm_event_messages.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.eme_seq1_nextval';
   l_eme_id  pdm_event_messages.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select pdm_eme_seq1.nextval 
           into l_eme_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_eme_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end eme_seq1_nextval;


end pdm_eme_tapi_pck;
